name: Red Pointed Cabbage
description: Pointed red cabbage is a type of red cabbage with a pointed head. It's leaves have a softer texture and sweeter taste and are more open than typical cabbage. It can be added to stir-fries and casseroles, boiled, sautéed, or fermented into sauerkraut.
sowing_method: Direct seed indoors (and transplant seedlings after hardening off) or outdoors
